ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:39:42 urn:comixology:800914 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:55:44. [Issue ID 2036883]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A COVERT MISSION AND A DEADLY SECRET!
VALERIA pushes past her injuries to sneak into the fortress of LORD BLASIUS!
But what could he possibly have that she'd risk losing track of her quarry over?
Could it be...the secret her brother died for?!
Plus: The next chapter of an all-new novella featuring one of CONAN's greatest nemeses-the wizard THOTH-AMON!
Note: Includes the fourth part in a five part The Fall of Thoth-Amon novella by Matt Forbeck.
ComicInfo.Title: Valeria, Chapter Four: Lord of Flies
ComicInfo.Letterer: Travis Lanham,VC's Travis Lanham,VC's Travis Lanham
